top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!
bit late but have a look at a kitchen working triangle

comments_since_last_sample.body: I'm imagining Twitch or TY live streams in the future after you made that comment about filming in the kitchen. Could be some good money if you streamed once or twice a week.

I don't see a vent hood in the final design. Downdraft vents _can_ work if you have to have that clean/minimalist look, but they also can be _loud_ since they have to move a lot more air to be as effective as one directly over the cooktop. 

And please don't try to go without. I don't know if you are doing a gas range, but if you are, you absolutely can't go without. Cooking with natural gas can be nice, but it is terrible for indoor air quality, so you _have_ to be able to vent the unburnt hydrocarbons, carbon monoxide, etc. that are produced.
